item.title: 8/4: The Daily Report
item.description: Nancy Chen reports on the ongoing redistricting fight in Texas, the fallout over the firing of the Labor of Bureau Statistics commissioner, and more.

item.title: 8/4: CBS Evening News
item.description: Democratic lawmakers who fled Texas speak out after being threatened with arrest; Number of butterflies decreasing across U.S.

item.title: 3 linked to suspect arrested in Tenn. killings of abandoned infant's relatives
item.description: Tennessee investigators allege Dearrah Sanders, Tanaka Brown and Giovonte Thomas "assisted" Austin Robert Drummond, who is wanted in the murders.
